result.html: Ghoil a imeacht uirthiHis departure hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ġoil a imeaċt uirṫiHis departure hurt her.

result.eng: I hurt my neck a few months ago.
result.ga: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shin
result.orig: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shin
result.html: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shinI hurt my neck a few months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ġortaiġ mé mo ṁuineál cúpla mí ó ẛinI hurt my neck a few months ago.

result.html: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineálI hurt my neck.
result.ponchtml: Ġortaiġ mé mo ṁuineálI hurt my neck.

result.eng: He was hurt in the leg.
result.html: Goineadh sa chos éHe was hurt in the leg.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ sa ċos éHe was hurt in the leg.

result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.orig: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.html: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag iarraiḋ gan an t-ainṁí a ġoin sa ċeannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.ga: Ghoin an masla go smior é
result.orig: Ghoin an masla go smior é
result.html: Ghoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin an masla go smior éThe insult hurt him deeply.

result.eng: She was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ga: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.orig: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bocht
result.html: Goineadh go croí í ag féachaint ar an duine bochtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.
result.ponchtml: Goineaḋ go croí í ag féaċaint ar an duine boċtShe was deeply hurt looking at the poor man.

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.orig: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce
result.html: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin sé mé go mbeaḋ mo ṁáṫair ag lorg déirceIt hurt me that my mother should be begging.

result.eng: No doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
result.ga: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabht
result.orig: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabht
result.html: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabhtNo doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
result.ponchtml: Ġoin an cruatan na hoileánaiġ gan daḃtNo doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.

result.eng: A kind word never hurt anyone.
result.html: Ní mhilleann dea-ghlór fiacailA kind word never hurt anyone.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁilleann dea-ġlór fiacailA kind word never hurt anyone.

result.eng: He would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ga: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.orig: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.html: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéanfaḋ sé a ḋaṫ ċoíċe a ġoinfeaḋ a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
